```{r setup}
library(gsa24v3manifest)
```

The main object in this package is the function `load_manifest` that loads the manifest (it may take a few moments):

```{r}
manifest <- load_manifest()
head(manifest)
table(manifest$Chr)
table(manifest$ProbeType)
```
